data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
MasonX is the standard namespace for Mason extensions, as agreed
    upon in the mason mailing lists. Lexer because it is a Lexer
    subclass. MSP because it is similar to ASP or JSP, but it is still
    *M*ason.

    Dave Rolsky said I should post it on CPAN, because others might be
    interested in this functionality.
